text: Patient is on lisinopril for blood pressure.
Patient is prescribed omeprazole for acid reflux.
Patient uses albuterol inhaler as needed.
Patient is prescribed warfarin for blood thinning.
Patient takes levothyroxine for thyroid issues.
Patient uses insulin injections to manage diabetes.
Patient is on amlodipine for blood pressure.
Patient reports taking ibuprofen for pain relief.
Patient uses a fluticasone nasal spray for allergies.
Patient is prescribed atorvastatin for high cholesterol.
Patient is taking sertraline for depression.
Patient uses a budesonide inhaler for asthma control.
